MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L23 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Little Crosby Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.08PM. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.15PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:13PM on 26th February 2021
